name: Turbo Mage
description:
The magic box is on the loose! Track it down and catch it as fast as you can, but beware of the changing gravity.

Later levels are unlocked by collecting points, which are obtained by completing the earlier levels faster. Can you achieve the S-ranked time?

Controls

  • Arrow keys - move
  • C - Jump
  • X - Dash (in direction given by arrow keys)

Other

Made using Godot in a couple of days for the 260th Weekly Game Jam.

All art produced during the jam.

Audio effects from FreeSound users igroglaz, Kastenfrosch, and music by DSTechnician from Pixabay
